column5: I went up and caught some walleye and bass so I know they are in there. Are there pike as well? Speck lakes nearby by any chance?  Matt.

Three Mile is good for Bass and Walleye ... so you got it covered ... if you do find out about the 'Speck lakes' and need company PM me ... I am not far from there and definitely willing to bishwack a wee bit
I havent BISHwacked in years Camil Not sure i remember how its done.

first which three mile are you referring to, unfortunately there are a few. Is it the one close to the town of Windermere or Rosseau?  if so, there is no pike in the lake, good sunfish, perch and rockbass populations. bass and walleye are the 2 main species in the lake most people target. i have a cottage up there but never seem to venture into any of the backlakes. i probably should start to.
defiantly bass and walleye and lots of weeds .. except for the bay to the north
